UVA Problems

Hoax or what


	
#include <iostream>
#include <sstream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>



using namespace std;



int main(){
	int n;
	cin » n;



while(n != 0){
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		
		vector<int> v;
		int k;
		string s;

		while(getline(cin, s)){
			stringstream ss(s);
			
			while(ss >> k){
				v.push_back(k);
			}

		}
		

	}

}


cout << "end" << endl;	


return 0; }
